name: phpBB-Ajax-Like
body:
### phpBB Ajax Like
add `Like` feature to phpBB3.

### Download
[Download phpBB Ajax Like](https://github.com/eMosbat/phpBB-Ajax-Like/archive/master.zip)

### Required MOD
[Download JQuery Pack for phpBB](https://www.phpbb.com/customise/db/mod/jquery_pack_for_phpbb/)

### Project Topic in phpBB
please follow update news and report bugs in this topic:
[Topic in phpBB](https://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=70&t=2162699)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
